item.description:
Hi All-

Let's get out on the town in style for this event!

The event starts at 8pm and I strongly suggest that you arrive early. I will be inside, but arrive when you can and call/text so I can find you! No pressure to show up at a particular time!

I am excited! Let me know if you have any questions about this event or where to meet the group!

See you there!

~Beth


TICKETS NOW ON SALE AND SELLING FAST!!:
Get your tickets here!


The Emerging Trends - Fashion events for the up & coming talents

Price: Gen: $40, VIP: $90, Ultra VIP: $140
Friday, October 2, 2009 at 8:00pm

Castle At Park Plaza Hotel
64 Arlington St
Boston, MA


Phone: 6174572281
Email: bostonfashion@theSYNERGYevents.com


After months of preparation, The 2009 Emerging Trends Event returns to the runway this fall for Boston Fashion Week. This upscale fashion forward event will be showcasing collections from up-and-coming designers from all around the globe on Friday, October 2, 2009 at the exclusive Castle At Park Plaza Hotel located at the heart of Boston.

With the successful launch of the Emerging Trends Event in 2008, The SYNERGY Events is committed in making the fashion industry flourish in Boston through creative and unique events. Not only is The SYNERGY Events building a community centered around fashion, but provides talented new designers with great opportunities and exposure.

Please join us this fall for an event unlike any other, helping to support Boston Fashion Week. An exclusive evening full of glamor and fashion, the 2009 Emerging Trends is unquestionably the event to attend this fall.

This year's line up:
* Keith Lissner (Bravo TV - The Fashion Show contestant)
* Nadia Ivanova (London) * DainHMaschile (New York)
* Heather Luca (MN) * Andy Jacques (Boston)
* Caitlin Allen (New York) * James Martinez (TX)
* Emily Hancock (Boston) * Angela Chen (New York)
* Christel Akouri (Boston) * J'aime Lizotte (New York)
* Crystal Noe (Boston) * Skylier A. Blanchard (California)

Hair: Indra Salon (voted Best of Boston 2009)
Makeup: Krystal Bilheimer & Lily Artist Management

Dress code: Industry Chic. Cash Bar Only!
Guests must be 21+. Doors at 8 PM Sharp.

****Hosted by MISS MASS 2009 - Alison Cronin****

Other attractions at the event include live music, cocktail reception and a trunk show for those who love to shop designer lines!

Live Performances by Sophia Moon & Marcie - two talented singers and song writers.

MORE INFO: HTTP://WWW.THEEMERGINGTRENDS.COM

General Admission: $40
- Access to the Event (standing).

VIP: $90
- Exclusive viewing of the show in the VIP area (seated)
- Networking opportunity with the designers, models and the invited media
- Complementary non alcoholic beverage

Ultra VIP: $140
- Exclusive front row seats to the show in the VIP area (seated)
- Networking opportunity with the designers, models and the invited media
- Complementary non alcoholic beverage
- Premium gift bags worth over $50

A portion of the ULTRA VIP Tickets will benefit the American Heart Association.
item.name: Emerging Trends - Boston Fashion Week 2009
